branchCategory.name: IRV10/20, Vacuum Regulator
branchCategory.description: <P>The IRV series vacuum regulator is offered in 3 compact, lightweight sizes. Adjustment resolution is possible within 0.13kPa.  Port sizes available are 1/8Rc(PT), and 1/4, 5/16 and 3/8 with Rc(PT), NPT or G(PF) thread types.</P>
